overview: Come join in with T-Bone and his friends as they learn, laugh and share the basics of Clowning. The world of clowning is a magical world shared by children and the child in all of us. Come now and explore this magic land of make believe with T-BONE, Artie, Brian and Jennifer as they learn, laugh and share the gentle art of clowning.  T-Bones special blend of magic informs, mystifies and brings out the clown in all of us.
title: T-Bone's World of Clowning
